title: My league rank isn't showing up
body: Well just today I went to play League Of Legends and I went into the information to see how much matches of ranked I won.Soon I noticed my rank was gone.I don't have the silver League up anymore nor the Lp was showing up.Please fix this problem as soon as you can.Thanks <3.{{champion:222}}  I main Jinx

replies.body: We're aware of the Ranked info issue and are looking into a solution as we speak. I don't have a timeline on when it will roll out, but please let me know if you have any other questions.
